definition: to look after/to take care of/to watch/to guard
to see/to look at/to read/to watch/to visit/to call on/to consider/to regard as/to look after/to treat (an illness)/to depend on/to feel (that)/(after verb) to give it a try/Watch out! (for a danger)

sentences.english: It may look like a severe sunburn, later becoming reddish Brown, rough, and scaly.
sentences.chinese: 初看似嚴重的曬斑，後呈紅褐色，粗糙並有鱗屑。

sentences.english: So she says she resorted to something a little crazy.
sentences.chinese: 所以她說她採取了一些看似有點瘋狂的做法。

sentences.english: It may seem obvious but you could be getting too little sleep.
sentences.chinese: 雖然看似是顯而易見的，但你可能真的是睡眠過少。

sentences.english: This may seem like a rampant game actually only designed by xishi appeared.
sentences.chinese: 這看似猖獗的遊戲實則只爲西施自行現身而設計。

sentences.english: It seems that maybe Tony may be the only one able to save her.
sentences.chinese: 至此湯尼看似就是那唯一能夠拯救她的人。

sentences.english: It was a seemingly irrelevant detail, whose import is suddenly clear.
sentences.chinese: 這看似是不相關的細節，但它的重要突然顯現出來。

sentences.english: Yu Dan is a modern Chinese paradox.
sentences.chinese: 生長在現代中國的于丹看似是一個矛盾體。

sentences.english: Complicated as it seems, English grammar has its basic rules.
sentences.chinese: 英語語法看似繁複無比，其實萬變不離其宗。

sentences.english: Duccio seems to have been gay and light-hearted.
sentences.chinese: 杜奇歐看似是快樂的和輕鬆愉快的。

sentences.english: It seemed as if the starlings had been hypnotised because they acted as if they were not being chased.
sentences.chinese: 椋鳥看似精神恍惚，因此它們的舉動像沒人追趕一樣。

sentences.english: A friendly man came and talked to him.
sentences.chinese: 一個看似面善的男人走向他跟他搭訕。

sentences.english: Modern magic fictions , seemingly absurd though, possess the essence of an intense reality-orientation.
sentences.chinese: 代魔幻小說雖看似荒誕但也有着很強的現實指歸性。

sentences.english: Late 2005, the nuclear standoff in North Korea is coming to a boil.
sentences.chinese: 直至2005，看似平和的核危機將於北韓再度升溫。

sentences.english: These `healthy` habits could be devilishly bad for you.
sentences.chinese: 這些看似健康的習慣可能會對你造成極大的傷害。

sentences.english: Washington seems incapable of fixing America's deeper problems.
sentences.chinese: 華府看似無力解決美國深層次問題。

sentences.english: Dear reader, this is the way it's supposed to work.
sentences.chinese: 各位親愛的看官，這個辦法看似可行呀。

definition: ordinary and mediocre (idiom); nothing to write home about
in fact/in reality/as a matter of fact/in practice
to appear to be/to seem as if
seemingly/apparently/looks as if/appear to be/gives the impression that/seems on the face of it to be
only/merely/nothing but/no more than/it's just that ...
